channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report X-2024071148
item.description:
Report X-2024071148

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-19T18:15:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-12
  • City: BUENA VISTA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Box containing 4, 1 gallon pails of Weldwood liquid contact cement placed sideways in trailer. Seals on 2 of 4 cans opened, 2 cans also bent. Contents for both those containers almost emptied. Package and clean up material contained in hazmat waste drums.

item.title: Report E-2024070233
item.description:
Report E-2024070233

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-12
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 1-cup of Pliobond 9725 was released due to being punctured. The spill impacted inside the trailer and the concrete dock floor. ERTS dispatched Environmental Works to the site to assist with clean up. Environmental Works personnel deployed oil dri to the impacted areas and containerized the recovered material into one (1) 55-gallon metal drum for disposal.
